sentences.sContent: In fact the rumor is without foundation.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact the rumor is without foundation.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，这个谣传没有根据。

sentences.sContent: When did you hear the rumor? - The day before yesterday.
sentences.sContent_eng: When did you hear the rumor? - The day before yesterday.
sentences.sCn: 你是什么时候听到这个谣言的？前天。

sentences.sContent: When the boys saw her, they would said it again and again, and more boys and girls believed the rumor.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the boys saw her, they would said it again and again, and more boys and girls believed the rumor.
sentences.sCn: 当男孩们看见她时，他们一次又一次说这件事，一些男孩和女孩相信了谣言。
